Tools for Provably Real Media

Read Introduction
Use see3-python (alpha)

see3_python

A Python library for our anonymous Cryptographic Descriptors. Everything you need to generate, use and manage privacy-preserving identities. Media-related features coming soon.

Realcaster

A Twitter alternative featuring 100% provably real content. Uses Farcaster in tandem with see3_react_native.
